attributes.action: introduce laws allowing local people first choice to local council housing in their areas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To introduce laws allowing local people first choice to local council housing in their areas. Families and communities are being destroyed because outsiders are given priority over local people which forces them to go outside of their communities. Just because people cannot afford to buy their own home shouldn't mean they have to leave the communities in which they were born, and communities in which they wish to remain.

government_responses.details:
